content: small bob is an adorable finger puppet that the friendly folks at malabrigo made as a gift especially for casey due to popular demand they asked the woman who crafted small bob to write out a pattern so that everyone who wanted to could crochet his or her own little small bob for technical help or pattern questions or if you just love small bob please join the friends of small bob 1 group here on ravelry please note the crochet hook sizes have a translation issue at the moment 0000 means 2 5mm and 0 = 1 5mm 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/friends-of-small-bob
